hero.title: Build the next generation
hero.subtitle: A powerful development platform that lets you focus on business innovation. Complete solutions from development to deployment, all in one place.

features.title: Why Choose Us
features.subtitle: We provide enterprise-grade solutions to help you build and deploy applications quickly

fastDeploy.title: Fast Deployment
fastDeploy.description: One-click deployment, quick launch. Get your application running in minutes.

secure.title: Secure & Reliable
secure.description: Enterprise-grade security, encrypted data transmission, ensuring your data is safe.

extensible.title: Easy to Extend
extensible.description: Flexible architecture design, supports rapid scaling to meet business growth needs.

monitoring.title: Smart Monitoring
monitoring.description: Real-time system monitoring, intelligent alerts, keep you informed of system status.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to our service. By using our service, you agree to comply with the following terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We value your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

auth.checkEmailDesc: A verification email has been sent to {email}. Please click the link in the email to complete verification.
auth.verifyEmailDesc: Click the button below to verify your email.
auth.invalidLinkDesc: This verification link is invalid or has expired. Please sign up again or contact support.
auth.resendVerificationFailed: Failed to resend. Please try again later.
auth.resendNeedEmail: Cannot resend. Please go back to sign up page.
auth.resendEnterEmail: Enter your registered email to resend verification
auth.loginDescription: Enter your email address to sign in to your account
auth.signUpDescription: Enter your information to create a new account
auth.forgotPasswordDesc: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.checkEmailForReset: Please check your email for the reset link
auth.resendResetEmailFailed: Failed to resend. Please try again later.
auth.resetPasswordSuccess: Password reset successfully! Redirecting to sign in...
auth.resetPasswordFailed: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
auth.passwordResetConfirmed: Your password has been successfully reset
auth.resetLinkExpiryNotice: This link is valid for 1 hour
auth.resetNotYouNotice: If this wasn't you, please contact support immediately
auth.resetLinkInvalidDesc: This reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one or contact support.
auth.acceptedTerms: I have read and agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

settings.title: Account Settings
settings.changePasswordDesc: Changing password requires current password verification
settings.changePasswordSuccessSignIn: Password changed. Please sign in with your new password.
settings.changePasswordFailed: Failed to change password. Please try again.

chat.emptyListHint: Click "New chat" above to get started
chat.deleteConfirmDesc: This action cannot be undone. The conversation and all its messages will be permanently removed.
chat.logoutConfirmDesc: You will need to sign in again to continue.
chat.welcomeTitle: What can I help you with today?
chat.messagePlaceholderHint: Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line
chat.errorNetwork: Network error. Please check your connection and ensure the backend is running.
chat.errorGeneric: Something went wrong. Please try again.
